sect1.title: Link-ins
sect1.para: Gadfly protein domain extents. Provide DAS server that allows gadfly to show extents of protein domain predictions (and PDB entries).

sect2.title: Gadfly
sect2.para: Have a column that would mark genes which had big expression changes observed under some conditions. i.e. A list of experiments sorted by significance of expression change.
A similar link-in would sort the list of mutations that affect the expression of a given gene. This would be a subset of the above list but one that many people would find useful.
